headlines.description: Manchester City eased back to the top of the Premier League as first-half goals from Bernardo Silva and Sergio Aguero earned a 2-0 win at Fulham.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man City back on top with easy win at Fulham

headlines.description: Pierre Hojbjerg scored the goal as Southampton withstood a second-half onslaught at Brighton & Hove Albion to secure a vital 1-0 win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hojbjerg strike gives Saints win at Brighton

headlines.description: Burnley moved five points clear of the Premier League's relegation zone after an early Conor Coady own goal and a late Dwight McNeil strike.
headlines.shortLinkText: Burnley beat Wolves to boost survival hopes

headlines.description: Huddersfield Town became the second team of the Premier League era to be relegated before the end of March after a 2-0 defeat at Crystal Palace.
headlines.shortLinkText: Huddersfield suffer early relegation at Palace

headlines.description: Leicester City marked an emotional day on what would have been the birthday of their late owner Vichai Srivaddhanaprabha by beating Bournemouth.
headlines.shortLinkText: Leicester mark late owner's birthday with win

headlines.description: Goals from Marcus Rashford and Anthony Martial secured a 2-0 home victory over Watford to put United back into the top four.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man Utd start permanent Solskjaer era with win

headlines.description: Everton scored two first-half goals to cruise to a 2-0 victory at West Ham United on Saturday and climb into the top half of the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Everton ease past ragged West Ham
